content.question: The rock-cut Longmen cave sculptures are significant within the tradition of Chinese art because they

choices.label: show that the tradition of Buddhist sculpture originally emerged in the remote regions of China
convey the importance of funerary monuments for early Chinese Buddhists
convey the support of the Chinese imperial court for the spread of Buddhism
show the adoption of iconography from traditional Chinese religions in depictions of the Buddha

content.answer: convey the support of the Chinese imperial court for the spread of Buddhism
